1.content: are you going to have tk or kari gain
1.title: choosing

11.content: Tai, Matt, TK, and the others were still in the digital world, working with their digimon in an attempt to save the digital world. TK had a secret, though. Whenever he looked at Tai, Matt or any of the other boys, he would become hungry, even going so far as fantasizing about eating one of them, enjoying the belly and eventual gain that came with it.
11.title: tk's thoughts

111.content: Today, it was TK's turn to find firewood for the night, so he set off with his Patomon, looking for branches that would be suitable for the job. On the way, he noticed a small digimon struggling under a branch. The digimon itself was scrawny, small, and slightly resembled Patomon, only smaller and with a different fur pattern. Not wanting to see it struggle anymore, TK hefted up the branch, freeing the digimon. The digimon thanked him, and said, "I know your secret. It's alright though, I can help." Then, the digimon started to chant something in a strange language, and TK started glowing. Patomon looked bewildered as nothing really appeared to happen to TK. Then the digimon explained that TK now was able to eat boys whole, as he could now fit them in his jaw, and in his stomach. In addition, the digimon talked to Patomon, and they both agreed to help TK with his desires. In fact, the other digimon, which was a different form of Patomon, belonged to a tribe of similar digimon. The two digimon took TK to the tribe, with a fire, and a group of other Patomon-like digimon surrounding it. They led TK to a shrine, and it turned out that the tribe was waiting for someone who wanted to eat human boys. This person would be treated as a god by them. TK sat on the shrine, enjoying the attention from the digimon, and the digimon, except for Patomon himself, left to fetch the other boys. Soon they came back with ___ tied up and naked, as they could not be sacrificed to TK with clothes hindering the digestion.
111.title: A lucky break

1113.content: TK was ecstatic to see all of the other digidestined boys in front of him, ready to be his meal. TK approached them and inspected them, deciding which one he wanted first. It turns out that feisty Tai would be his first meal. TK ordered the digimon to bring Tai to the shrine. Then TK...
1113.title: A feast of boys

11131.content: TK grabbed Tai by the shoulders and, with the tribe's help, he was able to heft Tai up, and open his mouth wide enough to shove Tai's head right in. Tai's hair was grainy, and did not taste good, so TK made sure to swallow that quickly, enjoying the taste of Tai's face as it rested on his tongue. The other three watched in horror as TK made his way past Tai's chest, getting a good taste of Tai's spicy, yet luscious skin. TK made it to the belly button, giving it a playful lick, as Tai's head entered TK's stomach causing it to start to bulge. It was amazing to see TK, who was easily a head or more shorter than Tai, eat him. TK made it to Tai's package, getting a particularly interesting taste, before he made his way down Tai's legs, his stomach already the size of a large, overinflated beach ball. TK finally made it to Tai's feet, which he found to be particularly delicious, and once Tai was completely inside TK's digestive system, he quickly slid down TK's esophagus, making a creepy lurching, slurping sound, and TK finished it off with a large belch. When that happened, TK was thrown off of his balance, as his stomach became larger than he was, so he laid on his stomach, enjoying the feeling of Tai's futile struggles, which formed lumps in TK's gargantuan belly, which was large enough to hold him completely of the ground. TK flailed in pleasure, and his shirt had ridden up to expose the impossibly large orb. Now that he had eaten one of the digidestined boys, TK...
11131.title: Satisfying a hunger

111312.content: TK was laying on his belly, giggling in delight. "Why are you doing this?!" cried Matt, who was crying over Tai's fate, like the others. TK replied, "I never told any of you this, but when I look at you guys, I just get hungry, and I want to eat you. These digimon understand me, and are helping me. Now I'm hungry for more. Are there any volunteers?" That question was rhetorical, however, as the tribe took the boys off. They had amazing magic, as they put the boys all on a spit, and while the boys were roasting, the digimon used more of the magic that they helped TK with, and soon, they had a smorgasboard of meats, burgers, steaks and the like. It was as if the digimon knew all of TK's favorites. TK gleefully chowed down, grabbing anything and everything, with much of the smorgasboard going into his greedy, overstuffed gullet. His stomach continued to lift him up, as it became the size of a recliner, with TK laying on it and enjoying it. Either way, he noticed a different taste in these meats, but he really liked the taste, which happened to be Izzy's taste. He finished the virtual feast, and got even more excited as the tribe told him that the feast was just Izzy, and that TK still had Joe and Matt to eat. TK...
111312.title: TK's hunger

choices: TK wants even more to eat.
1113121.content: TK was still ravenously hungry, and he was having a heyday with his new helpers. Now they had a new trick up their sleeves. The digimon tribe began by chanting something while circled around a weird symbol. Suddenly, both Tai and Izzy were back, just like normal, and TK still had his meal. They still had their memories, but it turns out that both of them loved to be eaten. They were willing to sacrifice themselves yet again, as they asked TK what he wanted to do. Matt decided that if the others enjoyed it, and TK enjoyed it, then he might as well join in. Joe remained skeptical, and TK did not mind that he stayed and resisted. Either way, TK had an idea in mind, and the tribe had the same idea. Soon, they were doing more chants and magic, and TK's three willing meals turned into 50 small boy clones each. Now the tribe began cooking. Some of Tai's clones jumped into a cauldron of soup, enjoying a soothing bathe. Luckily the tribe of digimon had also removed the boys' pain, so that it would be easier on them. Either way, other boys climbed into an oven that the tribe conjured up, and soon there was a buffet's worth of dishes, all made from digidestined boys. The boys were prepared, but still alive so that they could enjoy the journey into TK's waiting stomach. TK then dug in ravenously, slurping down the Tai soup, and eating a few roast Matts. Next he moved on to the Izzy shishkabobs, enjoying every savory bite. The digidestined boys were all having a ball, except for Joe, who was horrified. Either way, TK down more dishes featuring his delicious friends, and when he was done with his feast, his stomach was the size of a bed, and could easily function as one, as TK lie on it, enjoying its warmth and surprise softness. Now, TK could have Joe feed him, or the others, who the tribe conjured up again, could just feed themselves to him.
1113121.title: An insatiable appetite.

12.content:
Kari, Matt, TK and the others just got out of the digital world for a while until they are needed again. Kari was hanging around with the boys and felt something deep in the pits of her stomach. She gets this feeling when she looks at the boys even if she has just eaten a ton and felt like her belly was going to burst. Kari tried to sneak up to one of the boys but couldn’t get them in time before someone catches her. She loved how delicious they all look and thought of ways to eat them. She thought Tai looked the cutest and would love to fatten him up to eat whole. Lately, Kari was fantasizing about eating one of them, letting them live in her belly a bit, then turn them into fat.

“I have an idea. Why don’t I fatten them up so they find it difficult to escape? Then ill cook them up into nice food and eat them.” Kari said silently.

She got some things together and called Tai, Matt and TK over. They came and Kari’s plan fell into action.
12.title: kari

121.content:
Kari made sure the boys had eaten everything before making more food. She cooked up a couple pizzas, some spaghetti and many other things. Kari looked at the boys and started to feed them. TK was the last one she got to and made sure he had eaten the most. Matt and Tai watched in horror as their friend got stuffed like a turkey by the now deranged Kari. Kari loved TK the most and tied him up so he doesn’t escape.

“I just hope the bloating fat potion I added works soon.” Kari thought.

She looked over at Matt and Tai rubbing their belly and hoped they get fatter. Tai soon started to get fatter just as planned. When he was soon about ready to burst, Kari shrunk him down to the size of a basketball and baked another pizza. Before she finished it, Kari put the basketball sized Tai on it and made sure he was stuck into the cheese. She put another thick layer of cheese on top of him. Kari put the Tai pizza into the oven and forced TK and Matt watch him cook. When he was finished, Kari pulled out her Tai pizza and sliced it up.

“You boys would love this pizza. Oh waited, you two are already full and might burst if you eat anymore.” Kari said mockingly.

She ate the large pizza in front of TK and Matt as they pleaded her to stop eating him. She told them that if she doesn’t eat, she will become super skinny and starve to death. After a couple pieces of the pizza, Kari started to feel full. She looked at her belly and saw it was starting to push out from under her belly. Matt started to scream in horror as Kari continued to eat the Tai pizza with one hand and rub her ballooning belly with the other. TK watch as his friend gets eaten by the girl he likes. Kari took notice of TK’s actions and started to act cutely for him while eating the pizza. When she finished, she pressed her swollen fat belly up against his and kissed him.

“I’m going to save you for last TK.” Kari whispered into his ear.

She looked at Matt and thought of how to eat him. After a minute of thinking, Kari decided on…
121.title: Continue this story

choices: Kari tells TK her plan for him
1212.content:
To turn Matt into a cake. She made some cake batter and forced TK to watch as Kari feed Matt some more.

“Now TK, be a good boy and feed Matt this cake batter.” Kari said.

TK was untied and he got up. He fed matt the cake batter and made sure he ate it all. TK was against doing this and tried to escape. Kari caught him and sat him down and tied him up tight. She forced him to watch as she fed him more and more cake batter before she picked the boy up and dipped him into a bowl of cake batter. Kari then put Matt into the oven and watched him cook for a bit.

“When he’s done cooking, you’ll get a few good bites out of him and love it.” Kari said.

She went over to TK and rubbed his belly. She forced him to watch as Matt cooked in the oven while he screamed to be let go. TK didn’t want his brother go out like a cake and be eaten by this crazy girl but he was. He kept screaming and fighting to be let go but Kari has him there until the end. When Matt was done cooking, Kari pulled him out and decorated him. Upon finishing him, Kari started to feed some of the Matt Cake to fatten him up for his surprise. When he couldn’t eat anymore, Kari forced him to eat more and stopped. TK was still whining about what Kari did to his brother and she is being cruel.

“If I was cruel, I would have eaten you first.” Kari said.

She ate piece after piece of cake while TK watch his brother disappear for good. TK asked if he could have some more and Kari shoved a few large into him. She told him that those are the last pieces of the cake he gets. Kari went back to enjoy eating the cake on her own while tormenting TK by making him watch. With every piece she eats, she swells up a little bigger. When she finished the cake, she looked at TK and wondered what to do with him. It was getting late and she couldn’t eat anymore for now. She kept him tied up for the night and fell asleep near him.
1212.title: Cake Matt

choices: Kari keeps stuffing TK every day
12122.content:
Around mid night, TK was woken up by the smell of food cooking. He groggily opened his eyes and saw Kari was cooking again. TK looked closely at her eyes and saw they were closed. It took him a while but he soon realized that she was sleeping cooking. Tai was still a little stuffed from her feeding from earlier but gave in to his hunger. Kari kept cooking until she was done.

“Time to eat TK.” Kari said in a monotone voice.

She started to sleep feed TK the pizza, spaghetti, and hot dogs she cooked up for him. He soon was unable to eat much more until he couldn’t eat anymore. Kari started to force feed him until she fed him the remaining food. She unconsciously made more but bigger and thicker. She also made some thick hamburgers, some thick steaks, and a few pies cakes to go with. TK didn’t want to eat anymore but Kari forced him to eat it all. He started to fight her but his chubby friend but she, combined with her weight, over powered TK and kept feeding him. TK tried to wake her up but nothing worked. He about broke out but Kari put more rope around his wrists and ankles to bind him down even more. When she fed him all the food she prepared, Kari stopped and curled up in her sleeping bag.
12122.title: Kari sleep feeds TK

121222.content:
The following night TK was woken up by the smell of cooking. Just like the night before, he opened his to a sleep cooking and soon sleep feeding Kari was making more food for TK. He tried screaming at her in hopes to wake her up. Nothing worked but he soon realized that she was a very deep sleeper. Kari cooked up, like last night, a couple pizzas, spaghetti, and hot dogs for the first round of food.

“Time to eat TK.” Kari said in a monotone voice.

She feed him the food she just made and TK resisted. She jammed it down his throat making him almost lose it. She soon cooked up some more food for TK and talked to him for the first time.

“Do you know why I’m doing this TK?” Kari said.

“No, why are you doing this to me?” TK asked.

“For I’m about to eat you soon and I want ensure your fat enough when I do.”

Kari kept cooking in silence and hummed an old tone she knew. After a while, TK broke the silence.

“If you want, I could feed you so you could get fatter without eating me.”

Kari smiled at him and fed him the food she made. She forced him to eat it and didn’t stop. Just like the night before, she fed TK some hamburgers, steaks, pies and cakes. She made them extra thick and juicy so TK could get fatter. Kari stopped by TK soon after finishing feed him the food. TK did the same and hoped it would end soon.
121222.title: Another night of sleep feeding

1212221.content:
TK was fattened up to the point he wasn’t able to get any fatter. Kari was happy how he came out and wished he could get fatter. Sora found them after being gone for about 5 days. She was shocked at how big TK was and knew Kari was up to something. Kari told Sora the plan and she went on with it. Sora got a large bowl for Kari and some ingredients for her. Kari told TK she is going to cook him into a nice soup. She knew the soup was going to be quite large so she started a fire and put the bowl over it. She filled it up and forced TK in.

“Now be good and stay in there.” Kari said.

The water started to get really hot and started to bubble. Kari chopped up some carrots, beef, pork and some other stuff before putting it into the TK soup. She drenched him in the water making his hair soaking wet and filled with some of the stuff that Kari put into the soup. TK felt his fat getting warmed up inside him and Kari kept cooking him up.

“Now you’re ready to be eaten TK.” Kari said.

She started to eat the soup and held onto TK’s fat arm so he doesn’t escape. When she was about half done with the soup, her already fat belly had swollen up a bit and she was getting a little full. Kari thought she wouldn’t be able to eat TK or finish her large soup but went on anyway. She pulled him in and put her mouth onto his large belly. She bit into it a bit which caused TK some pain. With his body tasting great, Kari ate him whole and finished the soup. Sora went up to her and rubbed her belly.

“It’s so soft and comfortable. It’s like a big pillow.” Sora said.

She fell asleep with her head on Kari’s belly making it hard for her to get up. Kari knew she was a light sleeper and didn’t want to wake her. She put her arms around her sleeping friend and fell asleep herself.
1212221.title: TK gets eaten

choices: She wants to eat her brother now
Move on to one of the other boys
122.content:
Kari was enjoying being with the boys but wondered if they taste as good as they look. So she devised up a plan to fatten them up and eat them. So she left the group for a bit and let them do what they want. Kari snuck to a secluded area of the forest and started a fire. She got out some hot dogs, burgers, and pancake mix and started on them. When she finished cooking, Kari wondered who to feed first. Then it hit her, she will start with her older brother Tai.

“Tai, can you come here please.” Kari called out.

Tai came rushing to Kari to see if anything was wrong. When he got to the area where Kari was at, he didn’t find her. He was about to leave until Kari jumped out of the bushes and tackled him down. She then tied his hands and feet together and started to feed him the hot dogs, burgers and thick pancakes she had made. He tried pleading with her to stop but she kept going.

When Tai was full, Kari poked his swollen belly and giggled. She fed him a little more and told him how cute he looks with a swollen belly. He tried to break free of his binds but Kari just made them tighter.

“Please Kari, let me go. I can’t eat anymore. I’m sorry for whatever I did to you sis.” Tai said.

“Sorry Tai, I can’t let you go that easily.” Kari said.

She kept feeding him more and more as he continued to plead for his freedom and complain about being full and unable to eat anymore. When she thought he had enough for now, Kari rubbed his basketball sized belly and poked it a couple times. She loved how smooth and taut it was. Tai moaned in pain and kept pleading for his freedom.
122.title: Another story

choices: She gets ready to cook him
Kari moves onto one of the other boys
1221.content:
Kari let her brother rest for the time being and let him digest what he could while she cooked up some more. Kari wanted to feed him the same thing but she decided to make him a pizza. So Kari made him 3 large pizzas with every topping and made it super cheesy. When they were all finished, Kari woke her older brother up and pulled him out of his cage she made for him.

“But I’m still too full to eat Kari.” Tai said.

“But you’re not to full for your little sister are you?” Kari asked.

She looked at her brother cutely and he still told her he can’t eat anymore. Kari kept pleading but he kept telling her no. She then gave in and started to force feed him again. Tai complained that the pizza was too hot and he can’t eat anymore. By the time she fed him the first pizza, Tai’s shirt was up past his belly button and Kari rolled it completely off it. She rubbed her brother’s large belly and told him how great he looks fat. She then licked his belly a bit and said it tasted just like the pizza’s she fed him. Kari was turned on by how fat he was and kept licking his belly. Tai was somehow turned by this and told Kari to keep licking but she just smacked him.

“Time to keep eating.” Kari said.

She forced him the second pizza and this time she licked his belly in between pieces. She loved how fat he is getting and just wanted to fatten him up to burst. She was afraid that he will explode so she decided to fatten him up enough to eat. She wanted to know what it feels like to be nice and fat with a person in her. Before she could do that, she has to fatten up Tai a bit more. She stuffed the last pizza into her brother’s belly and licked it one last time. She put him back into his cage and locked him in there for the night.
1221.title: Kari keeps feeding Tai

12212.content:
Kari loved how nice and fat Tai was getting and wanted him to get fatter so he could be nice and juicy for her to eat. She made him some burgers so that he could be super meaty along with being super juicy. Along with the super thick and juicy burgers, she was making Mac & Cheese for her brother as well. She wanted him to fatten up nice and round to be eaten. Every time she stops feeding him, Kari licks Tai’s belly and loved how it tasted. She knew that he will be super tasty when she eats him. Every time his belly gets bigger, Kari tells him that it keeps getting tastier and tastier. She force fed her older brother the burgers and Mac & Cheese as he cried and pleaded to be freed but Kari only kept him tied up and kept feeding him.

“Please Kari, let me go. If you keep feeding me like this, I will explode.” Tai pleaded.

“Not until the brownies are about done.” Kari said.

While she made each batch, Kari let her brother lick the spoon. He did but after the 12th batch, he had stopped responding to her. She forced him to lick the spoon and he did until all the batches of brownies that Kari made. Kari looked at her crying and pleading brother and smiled. She gave Tai’s belly one last big long lick before starting to feed him. She shoved the first batch of brownies. She didn’t like how her brother was crying and pleading for his release but made him shut up by forcing him to eat more.

“If you keep crying like a big baby, then I will feed you till you explode.” Kari said.

Tai pleaded even more now but Kari kept forcing the brownies down his throat. When she forced all 30 batches of brownies into his belly, she started to lick his belly while he just sits there crying. From all that he was fed, Kari got up for she was ready to start her next part of her plan. She gave her brother’s belly a slap and went over to the oven. Kari was going to cook her brother into something delicious but what. She preheated the oven and looked at Tai. Kari wondered if she should fatten him up now or wait and eat him. So many choices for her but wanted to know what to do now.
12212.title: Time to prepare

choices: Kari preps Tai to be eaten
122121.content:
Seeing how big Tai is getting, Kari knew her older brother needs to be fatter in order for her to eat him. She was also curious on how much he weighs but she figured he had to be weighting in at least 200 pounds by now. So she woke her brother up early the next morning to see about it. Tai got up and Kari put him on a scale she brought. The scale read 210 pounds and Kari loved it.

“Kari, can you stop feeding so much. I don’t think I can take much more of this.” Tai pleaded.

“Sorry bro, but I think you should be a little fatter before I eat you.” Kari said.

Tai was now afraid now that she had just told him that he will be eaten. Kari tied him back down and started cooking. Kari wanted her brother to be super fat and juicy when she gets ready to eat him. She cooked him 12 large, super thick pizzas, many burgers and a ton of brownies. She wanted him to eat it all and get to her goal weight for him. Kari started to feed Tai and rubbed his belly while doing so with one hand. The girl loved how big her brother is getting and thought of how big he’ll get if she keeps feeding him like this for life.

“Kari, please stop.” Tai pleaded.

Kari ignored him and kept feeding him everything she made. As she fed him, Kari felt her older brother’s belly slowly get bigger with everything she fed him. Kari loved how big he is now and knew he was getting fat enough to eat. He nearly gained another 50 pounds and Kari knew he couldn’t get any fatter now or eat anymore and felt like his belly was going to burst if he does. Kari got down onto her knees in front of her older brother and rubbed his belly. She licked it as well and it tasted amazing. For some odd reason, Kari was somehow super turned on by her brother’s fat.

“I can’t wait to eat you.” Kari whispered in Tai’s ear.

Tai fell asleep from all the food and Kari stayed up rubbing and licking his giant belly. She soon fell asleep herself with her head on Tai’s belly.
122121.title: Fatten Tai up some more

1221211.content:
When it was about time for tai to get eaten, Kari got herself ready over the next week for her large meal. She pushed herself to eat a ton everyday and stretched her stomach out as much as she can and put on a few pounds. She returned to Tai and started to prep him to be eaten like planned. She planned on eating him in a giant burrito whether he liked it or not.It was going to take all day to do so and Kari knew she was going to love it. Kari started with the tortilla by making it 10 feet around, covered it with some cheese before putting it over the fire. When it was finished, she put another tortilla on top of it and another layer of cheese and did the same.

"Please don't eat me Kari. I'll be a better older brother." Tai pleaded.

"Too late bro, you're now to fat and delicious to pass up and not eat." Kari said.

Kari got some more food for him to eat and looked at him. She recently weighed her brother and he came out at 300 pounds even. She knew if she wanted him to be delicious, Tai had to be fatter and super meaty. So to make her Tai burrito even better, Kari fed him straight up meat and nothing else. She threw in some spices to make him more spicy for the burrito and watched him balloon up a bit more. The preparation for her meal was taking a bit to long but she didn't care. Before she got him wrapped up, Kari got him down to near nothing leaving him sitting in only a pair of shorts. She cleaned him up and fed him so he could be the right weight and juicyness she wanted him to be at.
1221211.title: prep time

choices: Go for both at the same time
12212111.content:
When she was finished prepping Tai, he alone actually weighs in at 600 pounds now after Kari’s meat only diet. She wrapped him in the tortilla she made and made sure it was tight around Tai making it impossible for him to move. The cheese stuck to him like glue making it super hard now. Kari kissed her brothers pudgy face one last time goodbye before wrapping it up. Making sure there was absolutely no way for escape, Kari prepped Tai for the final time before she eats him and turns him into her fat.

“Now you’re perfect to eat Tai.” Kari said.

Tai was still wrapped up struggling to get out and Kari thought it was cute that he was trying. Being a bit big herself now, Kari thought of how fat she will be when she turns Tai into fat. Due to his size, it will be a lot and it will take her a while to do so. She picked up her burrito and started to eat. Kari heard the muffled screams from Tai as she slowly inched down him. It was taking a while but Kari was enjoying this. When she finally finished eating him, Kari found it nearly impossible to get up with her now massive gut. Before this, Kari’s weight gain made it a bit hard for her to move around but this was worse.

“Well, at least my Tai burrito will keep me satisfied and fed until I’m able to walk again.” Kari said.

She felt Tai moving around in her and it felt nice. Some how he got out of his bindings and was kicking her. She got herself situated so that she isn’t on top of her brother but now sitting on her legs. Kari felt completely satisfied by this and knew she could make some room for Matt and TK when she gets to them.
12212111.title: Kari starts to eat Tai

choices: kari tells tk how she will eat him
Kari stuffs TK with some ice cream
122121111.content:
Kari decided on going after Matt and TK individually. She would start with TK for she like him the most. She waited a bit so she could digest all but her brother to make her load lighter. She still had the 600 pound load of a brother. She got TK to come over and he did. Kari got up and kissed him. She lost her balance and fell on top of TK due to her heavy front. She got up and tied him up while he tried to escape her.

“If you be a good boy and eat everything I give you, you would have to worry about joining Tai.” Kari said.

TK didn’t know if he should trust her but kept fighting to get free. Kari cooked up some pizzas, thick steaks, Mac and Cheese and many other things for TK. She started to feed him as he screamed and pleaded to be set free. Kari kept feeding him and occasionally poked his belly as it slowly got bigger as she fed him. She was getting annoyed by all this screaming and pleading for his freedom so she decided to taunt him. She grabbed him and put his ear to her large belly.

“Hear that, that is the sound of Tai trying to get out and the sound of your new home.” Kari said.

Kari kept feeding him as he continued to try to get free. She didn’t want him to get free so she made his bonds tighter and tighter whenever he tried to escape. Whenever he does manage to break free, Kari ties him back up and puts his ear to her belly to remind him of his soon to be new home. She also tells him how cute he is and pokes his belly. Kari continues on feeding him and makes sure he eate everything. She continued to poke his belly and loves how soft and round its was getting. With everything that Kari fed him, TK gets a little fatter as she continued on.
122121111.title: Go for both individually

choices: Kari stuffs goes after Matt for a while
1221211112.content:
When Kari thought he had enough pizzas, steaks, Mac and Cheese, she wanted to feed him something sweeter. So to make up for that, Kari got quite a bit of ice cream. She started to spoon feed him the ice cream as he pleaded to be freed. She spent the next couple days feeding him the ice cream and made sure he ate it all without a problem. When she had about enough of hand feeding him, she remembered that she got a machine that will feed a person for her. Kari moved the machine into place next to TK and started it up. It takes a minute to start up so Kari got down next to TK and rubbed his belly. She hasn’t felt Tai move or anything for a couple days now and noticed she was a little fatter now.

“I guess my brother became one with me like planned.” Kari said.

She rubbed her pudgy hands all around TK’s large exposed belly and looked over at the machine. It was ready to be used and she filled it with ice cream. She then mixed the compounds that came with it and started the feeding. TK felt his mouth fill up with ice cream and soon his already large belly. Kari put her hands onto his belly and felt it slowly growing. She knew he will be nice and round for her to eat soon. She examined the boy over and saw he was fattening up all over. Kari looked at the containers that the ice cream came in and saw it was super fattening and will cause the mass weight gain that TK is currently experiencing. She kept the machine going until TK was packed tight and ready to explode if he gets any fuller.

“Please, no more. I can’t take anymore of this.” TK pleaded.

“If I stop fattening you up, you will lose all this weight I gave you. Plus, I plan on eating you like I did to Tai.” Kari said.

She started to feed TK again on her own and made she he ate it all without a problem. TK fought against Kari but she was a bit too strong for him. She felt like TK should be fatter than Tai to make herself be fatter and for her meal to last long.
1221211112.title: Kari stuffs TK with some ice cream

12212111122.content:
Seeing how big TK is and how much weight she gained from Tai, Kari knew she was going to enjoy eating Matt and TK. She got both of the boys weighed and liked what she was seeing with them. TK weighted in at 560 pounds and Matt was at 600 pounds. For some reason, she was attracted to TK and wants to eat him next.

“Lets see how much you weigh from eating Tai.” TK said.

Kari stepped onto the scale and both boys looked to see her weight. The scale flashed a couple times before showing her weight. Despite eating a 600-pound boy, Kari now weighs in at 450 pounds. She likes it and wonders how big she would be after eating both of them. She was going to ensure that she gets the maximum amount of fat from them; she fattens them up some more.

“You know, I actually like this.” Matt said.

“Same here despite the fact that I’m going to be eaten first.” TK said.

Kari got TK up to 800 pounds on an all meat diet and liked how big he is. Matt on the other hand was at 650 pounds and was looking as good as TK. Kari thought of what to eat him as and decided on…
12212111122.title: Start eating TK

choices: Matt makes a run for it
1221211112221.content:
Eating him as a large pie. Matt got front view of what’s going to happen and couldn’t do anything. He just sat there as Kari got a large pie pan and got going on the crust. When the bottom crust was ready, she got TK into it and added a few other things including large chunks of meat and vegetables. She then covered it with a top crust and got him over a large fire. After a couple hours, Kari knew it was over and pulled the pie off. She smelt it and knew it was defiantly ready to eat. Before she dug in, she poked it a couple times before confirm that TK is now completely no longer an 800 pound Digimon user but now a large pie all for her.

“Time to eat for myself.” Kari said.

Matt was going to say something but was afraid she was going to do something to him to quicken his end. So he just sat there and watched as Kari ate away at the TK pie. She was enjoying herself and for some reason, he wanted a bit of it. Kari kept enjoying herself until she finished the whole pie. She lay in the pan for a little while before getting up.

“Matt, can you tell me what the scale says?” Kari asked.

Matt struggled to get up and looked at the scale. It read 600 pounds and she liked it. She told Matt that she would get at him soon so he had time to get ready.
1221211112221.title: Pie-fect

choices: Kari finds a way to start her weight gain
She starts by fattening up Tai
She starts with one of the other boys
123.content:
Kari enjoyed her time with the gang but she feels like something is off. she looked at herself in her mirror and for some reason felt like she was too thin. She felt like she should gain weight but how. She could go to the digital world and find something there to help but that would be too easy. Then again, there is quite a bit of easy stuff there in the real world that would help. She looked at Matt and TK and noticed how tasty they look.

“No, I can’t eat people. That isn’t right.” Kari said.

Then again, she could take one little taste. When Tai was out under the tree not far from their house, this was her chance. She made sure she wasn’t seen or heard by him as she crept up to him. She got down next to him, leaned over and gave him a strong, sisterly lick. He jumped up and she acted like nothing happen.

“Did you just lick me?” Tai asked.

“Me? Cant a girl just show her love to her bother?” Kari asked.

“She can but not like that.”

They went on with their day and Tai kept an eye on Kari. He was suspicious of what she might have in mind but in time he let up on her.
123.title: Another story

choices: Kari starts prepping Tai a little early
1232.content:
Tai forgotten about what Kari did to him but she didn’t. She liked how he tasted and wondered how he would feel and taste when eaten. Looking at him, Kari thought her brother was a little too thin. So she decided to change that and fatten him up. Tai looked at his sister and wondered what she’s up to now.

“Let me take you out to eat.” Kari said.

“What’s the occasion for?” Tai asked.

“Cant a girl show her love toward her brother by taking him out to eat?”

“OK, you don’t have to yell. I don’t mind spending time with you but you’ve been acting a little strange.”

Kari took her brother to a buffet to eat. She told him to eat whatever he wants and she would take care of it. He did and she watched him go at it. She really does love him and wants only him to be happy. She does like the rest of the gang but she has more of a thing for her brother. She wants to see him nice and fat before she eats him. When he stopped for now, Kari wasn’t satisfied with how much he ate so far. So to have a little fun with him, she filled the table up with food and started feeding him. She fed him with one hand and rubbed his belly with the other. Tai let it happen for she was only letting it happen. Kari kept stuffing her brother, did this with him every day for a week, and liked what she was seeing. He was starting to fill out and his pants were starting to strain against him. There was still a bit of give left and she liked how it was going. It was going to take some time but she can wait a little longer before having her brother.
1232.title: She starts by fattening up Tai

choices: Tai soon starts to catch on
Kari enters him into a contest
12322.content:
Tai got use to Kari spending all the time she could with him. When she isn’t with him, he felt a little off not having with her with him. When she gets the chance, she would try to lick him. She has gotten a few good licks on him but he ends up catching her eventually. What Tai doesn’t know is that Kari isn’t getting much satisfaction at the current pace. So she decided to increase his intake. But she didn’t want him to catch on right away so she decided to slowly and easily. She knew that in time he might catch on but not anytime soon.

“OK, let’s get this going. I want Tai to be nice and fat for when I eat him.” Kari said.

She made a plan to increase his intake every couple of days or so to ensure he doesn’t catch on. So she got going and Tai got use to her making him eat a bit more than usual. She told him that his increased hunger lately is because he is growing still. He is believing that but for how much longer. He just went with it and let his sister do what she wants. Tai only knew she was only showing her love as best she could. With every passing day, Kari helped Tai with what she had in mind and planned for she wanted him to be happy. Like she planned, Kari increased his intake a bit every 2 to 3 days and he hasn’t noticed yet. She kept doing this at the rate she was and knew that in time he would catch on but not now.

“Keep eating up and getting fat for your sister.” Kari thought.

She kept ensuring that he ate everything that was brought to him. He did and liked it all. What he really liked was the food she made for him. She made him a ton of food each time and he thought he wouldn’t be able to eat it all but with her help, Tai manages to do so. She helps by rubbing his belly and help feeding him while rubbing his belly. She did this for she wanted him to be happy as much as she wants him to be fat. Tai liked that for she was only expressing her sisterly love toward him. So he let Kari do what she wants to be happy. Kari liked that and liked how he was slowly but surely gaining weight. Without him knowing, in the last 2 weeks, Kari had doubled his intake and he hasn’t noticed.
12322.title: Kari increases his intake

choices: Tai turns on Kari a bit
Kari increases his intake quite a bit
123222.content:
With Tai’s weight gain going great and his intake now at nearly 10,000 calories a day. The last she checked, he was nearly at 300 pounds. What she wants is at least 500 pounds to be perfect or he wouldn’t be as tasty as she wants. She mainly feeds him meet and the likes to ensure he is nice and juicy. She doesn’t like using drugs for she wants his weight gain and fat to be natural.

“What are you really planning?” Tai asked.

“Like I said, I’m just expressing my love to you like a girl should. There’s nothing wrong with a boy getting a little fat from his sister.” Kari said.

While in a park, Kari spotted something on the corner of her eye. It was a sumo-wrestling tournament. It was for boys only to compete, which was perfect. Feeding her brother wasn’t cheep and she would be completely broke by the time she’s 20. So this was going to be good for the prize money was high. Without him knowing, Kari got him signed up and got him started. She still hasn’t told him until the day of it.

“I can’t believe you did this to me?” Tai said.

“I know but I don’t want you to get too fat and be useless. By doing this, you get to use all the fat I helped you gain.” Kari said.

They got him dressed in the attire he needs to wear in it. It was for the day and they got going. Tai gave it all and managed to get a good winning streak. By noon, they had a large lunch for all those still in. it was tough now for they were not only the best so far left in but also they were now weighing them down with all this food.

“You can do this Tai. Make your sister happy.” Kari thought.

Tai kept going and kept winning. When the final match came, Tai was going against a girl nearly double his size. That didn’t deter him for he knew he could win. They went at it and Tai had a slight under hand for a while until the girl slipped up. When he had the chance, Tai took it and threw the girl out of the ring. The judges came and gave their final review. When they finished, Tai won regardless. He was given the reward and Kari collected all the bets she won. With that money, they had more than enough to continue Kari’s plan. Kari took her brother out to celebrate his victory. Kari stuffed her brother to the point any more would cause him to burst. He just kept telling himself she was just showing her love and likes it. Kari let her champion brother rest before getting back to normal.
123222.title: Kari enters him into a contest

choices: Kari starts prepping Tai a little early
1232221.content:
With Kari still stuffing her brother as much as she could every day and makes sure he eats everything. Tai likes it for she was only doing this to take care of him and nothing else. He just kept telling himself she was taking care of him like a good little sister and just showing her love the only way a little sister could, just taking care of her brother any way she could. She loved it and he was letting her do so. He feared what she might do to him if he refuses.

“Keep eating and keep getting fat for your sister.” Kari said.

Tai did and kept going. After a while longer of this, Tai felt for a little change. When she wasn’t looking, Tai snuck up on her, which wasn’t easy for a guy as fat as he was. When she realized he was behind her, Tai grabbed Kari and held her tight.

“I knew you loved your sister no matter what.” Kari said.

“That and I want to have a little fun with you.” Tai said.

He sat her down at a comfortable spot and started to stuff her. It was a bit of the left over’s they had from Tai’s last feeding. Kari wondered what he was doing and let him do it. Just like what she done to him, Tai stuffed her for a little fun. She soon realized that he was using the same tactic she used on him. She let him do it for it was only sibling love. They would alternate every now and again when they were full and it didn’t take long before Kari started to show a belly. He would tease her a bit for get fat but that was only fair for she made him the fat guy he was. She let him do it for not only for sibling love but she wanted him to be comfortable being as big as he is even if she was just a little chubby. It would be a matter of time before she becomes as big as him or even go through with her plan and eat him.
1232221.title: Tai turns on Kari a bit

info.brief_description: kari or tk becomes fat by eating the boys.
info.description:
become kari or tk and start gaining weight by eating the other boys.

rules for things not wanted: no death, no others gaining, no bad language, no slice up,and no adults being eaten.

rules for things wanted: tk or kari and eating the others boys, you can have tk or kari having lackies but they have to be feeding tk or kari. you can only eat the boys, please add about cooking the boys into food,always have the boys eaten whole, and have tk or kari gaining, force-feeding, also you can use the boys from other seasons as well

you can other things but those are the basic rules.

if you add i'll give gps.

p.s. if you add more than 5 i'll give 500 gps. but you have to follow the rules and add a good chapter. at least one paragraph if you want 500 gps.
info.pretty_title: kari and tk weight gain vore
